uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.configuration

Class LocalConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.configuration.LocalConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SadConfiguration

    @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="sad")
public class LocalConfiguration
extends Object
implements SadConfiguration
    Grabs default project configuration properties from application.properties.
